snippet.title: Mike Shadow: I paid for it! - Official Trailer
snippet.description: Fight against THE vending machine that fooled Mike Shadow. With over 120 upgrades you will spend a million hours playing this addictive game! Revenge using weapons, magic, cheerleaders and the most devastating powers you've ever seen!
